info.title: NetworkManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure Network management API provides a RESTful set of web services that interact with Microsoft Azure Networks service to manage your network resources. The API has entities that capture the relationship between an end user and the Microsoft Azure Networks service.

delete.description: Deletes the specified DDoS custom policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: ddosCustomPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the DDoS custom policy.

204.description: Request successful. Resource does not exist.

202.description: Accepted and the operation will complete asynchronously.

Location.description: The URL of the resource used to check the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets information about the specified DDoS custom policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: ddosCustomPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the DDoS custom policy.

200.description: Request successful. The operation returns the specified DDoS custom policy resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a DDoS custom policy.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: ddosCustomPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the DDoS custom policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update operation.

201.description: Create successful. The operation returns the resulting DDoS custom policy resource.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting DDoS custom policy resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Update a DDoS custom policy tags.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: ddosCustomPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the DDoS custom policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update DDoS custom policy resource tags.

200.description: Update successful. The operation returns the resulting DDoS custom policy resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

DdosCustomPolicy.description: A DDoS custom policy in a resource group.

properties.description: Properties of the DDoS custom policy.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the DDoS custom policy resource. It uniquely identifies the resource, even if the user changes its name or migrate the resource across subscriptions or resource groups.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the DDoS custom policy resource.
